types.html:
mettre les formes

  1. (informal) to be tactful, to respect conventions, to do something with manners, to do something nicely

Usage notes

[edit]

Often used with the pronoun y: y mettre les formes.
trans: to be tactful, to respect conventions, to do something with manners, to do something nicely
to be tactful, to respect conventions, to do something with manners, to do something nicely

title: mettre les formes
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /mɛ.tʁə le fɔʁm/ ~ /me.tʁə le fɔʁm/
